name: RetrieveEnterpriseMetadataTemplates
description:
Retrieve metadata templates for the user's enterprise.

Used to fetch all metadata templates designated for use within the user's enterprise.

parameters.name: pagination_start_marker
parameters.description: Position marker to begin returning results, used with marker-based pagination. Requires `usemarker` to be `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: maximum_items_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page when retrieving metadata templates.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
